trans-unit.source: Manages serialization processes at run time.
trans-unit.target: Gere os processos de serialização em tempo de execução.
Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This class performs similar tasks as the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectManager>.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe executa tarefas semelhantes como <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectManager>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectManager>

trans-unit.source: The main difference is that the SerializationObjectManager performs its tasks during serialization while the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectManager> performs its tasks during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: A principal diferença é que o SerializationObjectManager efetua as respetivas tarefas durante a serialização durante o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectManager>efetua as respetivas tarefas durante a desserialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationObjectManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationObjectManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> class that contains information about the current serialization operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>classe que contém informações sobre a operação de serialização atual.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Invokes the OnSerializing callback event if the type of the object has one; and registers the object for raising the OnSerialized event if the type of the object has one.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o evento de chamada de retorno OnSerializing se o tipo do objeto tem um; e regista o objeto para gerar o evento OnSerialized se o tipo do objeto tem um.

trans-unit.source: The OnSerializing callback event is created by applying the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerializingAttribute> attribute to a method on the registered object.
trans-unit.target: O evento de chamada de retorno OnSerializing é criado ao aplicar o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerializingAttribute>atributo para um método no objeto registado.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerializingAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the OnSerialized event is created by applying the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerializedAttribute> attribute to a method on the registered object.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, é criado o evento de OnSerialized aplicando o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerializedAttribute>atributo para um método no objeto registado.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerializedAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Registers the object upon which events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: Regista o objeto no qual serão desencadeados eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationObjectManager.RaiseOnSerializedEvent%2A> method will be called on the registered object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationObjectManager.RaiseOnSerializedEvent%2A>método irá ser chamado no objeto registado.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationObjectManager.RaiseOnSerializedEvent%2A>
